ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡± Israelâ€™s Knesset voted 59â€“25 to revoke Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrichâ€™s order raising the VAT-free online import cap from $75 to $150. The move would have allowed Israelis to shop on sites like Amazon & Temu without the 18% VAT up to $150. While popular with consumers, local businesses blasted it as harmful to domestic industry.
